extendedInfo.description: EventPilot Plus mobile conference app for the LCTCS Annual Conference, which convenes LCTCS faculty and staff from across Louisiana for professional development and sharing of good practices in teaching and learning. LCTCS 2011 Annual Conference and MoodleMoot will be at the Baton Rouge River Center on Wednesday, March 23 through Friday, March 25, 2011.Features include:â¢ Daily schedule builderâ¢ Global session, speaker, and exhibitor searchâ¢ PowerPoint slide integration for presentation note taking and slide tweetingâ¢ Twitter integrationâ¢ QR and Bump for attendee contact sharingâ¢ Attendee list
